title: Lars Mellström
text:
Lars Gustav Fredrik Mellström (September 14, 1904 – May 4, 1983) was a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> for <a href="Hammarby%20IF%20Boxning">Hammarby IF</a> who competed in the <a href="1928%20Summer%20Olympics">1928 Summer Olympics</a>.
In 1928 he was eliminated in the second round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20bantamweight">bantamweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="J%C3%A1nos%20Sz%C3%A9les">János Széles</a>.
